text: thi cring thi phraxngkh thrng ham phwk cea nan pheiyng tæ satw thi tay xeng læa leuxd læa neux sukr læa satw thi thuk pelng seiyng thi man pheux xun ca kxallxh læw phu dı di rab khwam khabkhan doy michı phu seaa sæwngha læa michı pen phu lameid khxbkhet læw sir k mimi bap dı «kæ khea thæ cring xallxh pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng metta semx
